```{r}
# load packages
require(wordcloud2)
require(googlesheets4)
require(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
# import data and name variable
cloud_data <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10afkYnxM_NmeGSjpsnu_D1CgHmZPelL-kgW7i_Zmc58/edit?usp=sharing")
names(cloud_data) <- c("Function")
```

```{r}
# create frequencies of functions
cloud_data <- cloud_data %>%
  count(Function)
```

```{r}
# generate diamond shaped word cloud
wordcloud2(data=cloud_data, size = 0.5, shape = "diamond")
```
